threats.title: Developer commits secret to Git
threats.description: A developer commits secrets to version control either accidentally or on purpose. An angry employee with read access to the repository finds the secrets and proceeds to use them to steal end-user data
threats.mitigation:
Vault 
Adhere to principal of "Need to Know" and ensure that production secrets are not shared with individuals who don't have a need to know.
Adhere to principal of "Least Privilege" and ensure secrets only have the permissions to perform necessary functions.

threats.title: Container Registry Access
threats.description: Container permissions are not segmented and a developer is able to push images to the registry where production images are pulled from. They publish a backdoor image and tag it as latest
threats.mitigation:
- Log all image pushes and pulls
- Utilise a separate container for testing and production
- Ensure only the CI/CD system can publish in production container
- Implement image signing and only allow deployment of properly signed images
- Utilise principle of least priviledge

threats.title: New STRIDE threat
threats.description: Provide a description for this threat
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Malicious Package in Repository
threats.description: A malicious package is hidden in a public GitHub repository. A developer adds this package into the project, creating a backdoor access.
threats.mitigation:
- Require multiple users to review and approve all changes - creator cannot be one of these reviewers
- Mandate packages can only come from company approved sources
- Use threat detection software to identify

threats.title: Dependency Compromised
threats.description: Compromise of the dependency allows for injection of malicious code
threats.mitigation:
- Ensure automated dependency analysis
- Lock files so same version of dependency is being used
- Ensure only company approved sources are used ie those that have higher security
- Subscribe engineering team to security disclosure distribution lists to be alerted when supply chain attacks are discovered

threats.title: Admin Device Stolen
threats.description: Bypass password protection and have full access to all systems
threats.mitigation:
- Encrypt company devices
- All devices have minimum levels of security requirements
- Use policy of least privilege to minimise access of individual 
- Ensure ability to deactivate a person/device's access once reported stolen
